plot: Set to Gilbert and Sullivan tunes, a musical cartoon attempts to describe the character of the British nation, with occasional interruptions by Prince Charles.
title: Know Your Europeans: The United Kingdom
plot_es: Set to Gilbert and Sullivan tunes, a musical cartoon attempts to describe the character of the British nation, with occasional interruptions by Prince Charles.
original_name: Know Your Europeans: The United Kingdom
